title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.9 - Prohibition of landing or taking off under certain circumstances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.9 - Prohibition of landing or taking off under certain circumstances

State Regulations

The airport operator may prohibit aircraft from landing, except for emergency landings, or taking off at any time, when, and under any
circumstances under which, the airport operator deems such landings and
takeoffs likely to endanger persons or property, exceed the weight limitation
established for the airport, or exceed the noise limits for aircraft specified
in this section when in effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
